Reviews.Title: “very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: bassemonline
Reviews.Content: I spent a week at this hotel for my honeymoon in Istanbul The hotel has a prime location next to takasim square (among the best places in Istanbul). the location will allow you to avoid taxis and it is near many points of interest and recreation. Prices are around 250 to 320 euros for a double room. But vpous can get a better price through a travel agency

Reviews.Title: “Tale of 2 Hotels”
Reviews.Author: SuzyM54
Reviews.Content: Depending on the room you get, will greatly influence your perspective on this hotel. We booked 2 rooms, same price, same category. Our room was horrible, in every way, while the other room that was given to our Cousins, was great. We checked in first, and were given the horrible room, while our Cousins checked in a couple of hours later, and were given the suite. I asked upon check in, if we had the same type room and was told we did. Now, I wouldn't wish our room on anybody, and am pleased that our Cousins got the fabulous, large, modern room with a view, but why would the hotel give us, the worst room in the place. Both reservations were booked by me, reserved by me, and paid for by me! I would never stay here again, because there is no guarantee on where or what kind of room you would get, plus they will tell you they are all booked and don't have another room to give you. Of course, if I had been given the upgraded suite, with modern touches, and a comfortable bed, I would be giving this hotel an entirely different review.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant surprise”
Reviews.Author: VanesaPlovdiv
Reviews.Content: Compared to 4star hotels I stayed at in different European capitals,Konak hotel was a pleasant surprise.Good sleep quality, very clean,nice decoration, perfect location,very satisfactory breakfast

Reviews.Title: “great little hotel”
Reviews.Author: alfi-in-dxb
Reviews.Content: Great hotel, location was ideal & not a far walk from Taksim Square. Also easily located to walk down the hill to the Bosphorus, tram stations & football stadium. Room & bathroom size we fine, bed was pretty rigid & the A/C system was working the best. The small terrace to the side street was a nice addition, able to sit out & have a afternoon drink in the sun & watch the locals wander around. Generally the hotel was really good. Helpful staff, very accommodating during our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Very good experience!”
Reviews.Author: Yoav_A_111
Reviews.Content: We're a couple that came to Istanbul for the first time for an extended weekend, as one of us participated in a medical conference in the city. We chose the Konak Hotel because of its proximity to the Istanbul Conference Center, and because of the good reviews here on tripadvisor. I'm very happy to write that we were not disappointed. We arrived at Ataturk airport near midnight, so it was very helpful that the hotel sent a driver for our pickup. We found the superior double room we reserved to be very clean, which is very important to us, and also surprisingly large. We asked in advance for a quiet room on a high floor, and got one on the top seventh floor. It wasn't facing the street, so it was indeed very quiet (though not much of a view from our window... but we prefer no-view and no-noise!). The staff was nice and helpful throughout our stay. The breakfast was nice and tasty with fresh pastries, though we must write that its general variety wasn't large. The location was perfect for us - if you come to Istanbul for a conference, this is the closest hotel to the Istanbul main conference center apart from the Hilton. It is also very close to Taksim Square, which is the main public transportation hub for Istanbul (and also the terminal for the airport shuttle buses, which we used for our trip back to the airport). Apart from business, a trip should of course include at least a little pleasure, and as the hotel is a short walk away from Istiklal street, the main shopping and nightlife street of the city, we had plenty of that as well. We found the Konak Hotel to be be very nice, welcoming, clean, quiet and well situated for our needs. We recommend it whether you intend to visit Istanbul for a conference, for business or for pleasure. Should we come to Istanbul again, we'll be sure to stay there.

Reviews.Title: “Cost effective boutique hotel well worth a stay”
Reviews.Author: eggestad
Reviews.Content: This boutique hotel is well worth it, and conveniently located in the Taksim area of Istanbul. In particular, since traffic in Istanbul may easily be horrendous, staying CLOSE TO your meetings for the next day, is crucial. This hotel, only 45 minutes from the airport in some daytime traffic, is well run, no frills, but absolutely worth it. Beds are hard (!), but rooms are well kept, clean and with good amenities. The breakfast is a little minimal on ambience, but selection is OK and is served fresh. The internet connection was variable, I have to admit, and during peak hours, it was hard to get much bandwidth. I will absolutely stay again, well worth it.

Reviews.Title: “Just enough”
Reviews.Author: SaraDallal
Reviews.Content: Konak Hotel is in a very close proximity of Istiklal street and has a starbucks very close by as well. The rooms are very nice and clean. There is a small shop directly next to it where its easy to get water and it has a hairdresser next to it as well. Very Safe environment as well.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice and Comfortable Hotel”
Reviews.Author: RAASHID
Reviews.Content: The location of the hotel was excellent and very near to Taksim. I stayed here for five nights. The staff was very helpful and courteous. The check in and checkout was very quick. The rooms were very spacious,clean with daily change of linen, towels and other toilet essentials. The breakfast was excellent with a very good menu to suit everyone's taste with ample availability of variety of juices and tea/coffee. My flight in the evening was late so I requested for a late checkout till 3 pm which was granted.The pick up and drop at the airport can also be arranged by the hotel at a very reasonable cost. There are money exchange shops and also good food outlets nearby. For my next visit to Istanbul I would surely prefer to stay again in this hotel. I recommend this hotel for the business travellers and for the couples and families.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient clean hotel in Taksim”
Reviews.Author: AmazingIstanbul
Reviews.Content: The location of the hotel is away from Taksim busy area, however the area is quiet and it is 5 minutes walking to Taksim square, the hotel is facing Taksim Hilton hotel. Konak is a very clean and quiet hotel, the breakfast is amazing specially pastries which were unbelievably tasty. Staffs were helpful and are good in English. The size of the room was good, elegant and very clean and well furnished, toilet and shower are in good shape. I recommend this hotel for business traveler as well as for couples.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Mojgan T
Reviews.Content: Very nice and helpful staff, good location, but noisy.

Reviews.Title: “Konak Istanbul - tucked away but still close to Taksim and good value”
Reviews.Author: munders123
Reviews.Content: This is not a 'total luxury' establishment. The restaurant is a bit boring although the breakfast room was fine as was the breakfast itself. The place is clean, rooms likewise, all very tidy and well looked after. Staff very helpful and it's only 10 minutes walk from Taksim Square (away from any noise). We stayed for long weekend, having dinner elsewhere every evening so cannot assess their food. (Apart from breakfast which was certainly acceptable). So, it's a small 'boutique' style place. Good for a weekend where you want to go see the sights etc.

Reviews.Title: “Clean Hotel but Integrity is suspect !! Be careful !!”
Reviews.Author: GeetaDelhi
Reviews.Content: Hotel is reasonably clean and the food is average. We left our small digital camera by mistake in the hotel and returned in less than ten mins to collect. Unfortunately, we made the mistake of calling the hotel and telling them where we left it !! Our guide too thought the hotel staff might be involved !! So, be very careful with your belongings not only in the city but also the hotels !!

Reviews.Title: “We like your service & love all your excellent staff...we'll be back!=)”
Reviews.Author: beautymarlyn
Reviews.Content: I like your friendly Staff and excellent service for my team last June 19-24 and June 26-30'11. You are all like a family to all of us. We appreciate your staff kind assistance in the lobby, reception and room service. I commend your Hotel. GOD bless you more guest. Hope to visit you again this November. :)

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value For Money”
Reviews.Author: ajohardy
Reviews.Content: Ideally located hotel within a short walking distance of Taksim square. Friendly staff with good sized rooms. Excellent value for money with a friendly and efficient front desk. I have stayed in hotels all over the world and if you are looking for a decent budget hotel, this one fits the bill. I also got free WIFI access during my stay with above average connectivity and free breakfast thrown in too.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: HJDing
Reviews.Content: I was grateful for the accommodating staff who allowed my colleagues and I to check in way before the designated check in time. The staff were friendly. Food was good. Rooms were cosy and clean. My only grouse is that the hotel was rather noisy at night because of its proximity to the main road. Perhaps the management could sound-proof the rooms?

Reviews.Title: “The Best Hotel and would surely stay again”
Reviews.Author: naseer73
Reviews.Content: It was indeed an excellent experience while staying in konak Hotel Istanbul. Extremely friendly staff and the hotel rooms are very elegant and clean. The food in the restaurant is excellent too. The value added factor is that Taskim Square is just on five minute walk from the hotel. During my stay I almost experienced a trap by unknown person and the hotel staff was there to protect me after I approach the security. I am garteful to Konak hotel staff for protecting me.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent quality - price value”
Reviews.Author: 123MontrealQC
Reviews.Content: I was in Istanbul for 7 night with my family. I was there for three days medical conference and used the rest of the trip to enjoy istanbul with the family. Konac hotel provided excellent customer service, Clean and spacious rooms and delicious breakfast service included . The hotel is in a strategic location (300 m) of Hilton Istanul and Hilton conferences building. I really did enjoy may stay in this hotel with great quality for price ratio.

Reviews.Title: “See, stay, satisfy !”
Reviews.Author: emelie01
Reviews.Content: I have been in Turkey for two weeks.And spent my recent days in an excellent hotel,name is Konak Hotel. While making my reservation, I benefit from free transportation offer which is really cheap,also lunch,dinner, drinks etc.Rooms are clean and roomy.Wi-fi is free of charge :) The hotel is walking distance to the night clubs. When you go out the hotel in the evening, you will notice the lights everywhere.it is like surrounding you. See,Stay,Satisfy :)

Reviews.Title: “What a wonderful service !”
Reviews.Author: sandra13sandra
Reviews.Content: This is my second trip for Ä°stanbul, I stayed at Hotel Konak on behalf of my friend who visited to Ä°stanbul many times. The hotel is located in near Taksim square.And it is 5 minutes walking distances to the shopping area. Service was great and buffet breakfast was amazing.The staff was extremely friendly and helpfull. Hope to see you again for my next trip.

Reviews.Title: “Cozy and had a perfect location”
Reviews.Author: Heyam0
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed my stay in this hotel as it has an access to the metro station, 4minutes walk from Taksim Square and near Othmanbey. You could take a bus or walk from there at any time. The rooms were clean and good, food was good and the wireless net was fast you can take an ipod and use it there no need to bring your labtop to connect. It is not my first visit to Turkey but it is definitly the best hotel I had ever tried there.

HotelInfo.Name: Konak Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Cumhuriyet Caddesi 75 | Elmadag-Taksim, Istanbul 34437, Turkey
